name: nix-build
usage:
nix-build [pathsâ€¦] [--arg name value] [--argstr name value] [{--attr | -A} attrPath] [--no-out-link] [--dry-run] [{--out-
link | -o} outlink]

options.description: Do not create a symlink to the output path. Note that as a result the output does not become a root of the garbage collector, and so might be deleted by nix-store --gc.
Show what store paths would be built or downloaded.
Change the name of the symlink to the output path created from result to outlink.

tldr:
> Build a Nix expression.
> More information: <https://nixos.org/releases/nix/latest/manual#sec-nix-build>.

- Build a Nix expression:

`nix-build --attr {{expression_name}}`

- Build a sandboxed Nix expression (on non-NixOS):

`nix-build --attr {{expression_name}} --option sandbox true`
